name: Documentation Center of Vegetal Biodiversity: BCN-Phycophyta
description: The algae collection of the Herbarium BCNcontains more than 7,000specimens. These samples correspondto marine macrophytes, basically phaeophytes, rhodophytes andchlorophytes, which come from allalong the coastline of the Iberian Peninsula, but mostlyfrom the Catalan-speaking territories (PaÃ¯sos Catalans), the Basque Country and Galicia. In terms of taxa, there is a substantial representation of the genusCystoseira.
